description: Subcontracted Google Fiber workers of AWU have filed a request to the NLRB for unionization, and it seeks to negotiate with both their vendor and Alphabet. They contend that Alphabet is a “joint employer.” They want to have a greater voice in shaping their working conditions.
author: wynniechan
addresses: Alphabet Academy Child Care, 3200, Wayne Avenue, Ivanhoe, Kansas City, Jackson County, Missouri, 64109, United States
